title: Mirror of Germany. No. 280 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Germany (West) - Politics and government
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: St. Martin's Day is celebrated in Bonn and other towns; television specialists from Argentine hold rehearsals in German studios in preparation for the World Cup Soccer matches; The Society of Technical Co-operation coordinates West German technical assistance with the Third World; The Hamburg Art Hall welcomes children who learn to appreciate the paintings of past centuries; motor cycling is increasingly popular and thus creates new jobs; The 150 year old Theatre of Coburg is one of the finest in Germany and West Germany draws against Romania in the Indoor Handball championships.
